pepc-e/error_test.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !  =========================
00002 !
00003 !  Estimate force errors
00004 !
00005 !  =========================
00006 
00007       subroutine error_test(ntest)
00008 
00009       use physvars
00010       implicit none
00011 !      integer, parameter :: ntest = 3
00012       integer ntest
00013       real*8, dimension(ntest) ::  potd, exd, eyd, ezd
00014       real*8 :: dfx2, dfy2, dfz2, fxs, fys, fzs, dpot
00015       real*8 :: errfx, errfy, errfz
00016       integer :: i
00017 
00018 
00019 
00020 ! direct force evaluation
00021 
00022       call force_direct(ntest,x(1:ntest),y(1:ntest),z(1:ntest),q(1:ntest),eps,force_const,exd(1:ntest),eyd(1:ntest),ezd(1:ntest),potd(1:ntest))
00023 
00024 
00025 ! find rms error
00026 
00027       dfx2 = 0.
00028       dfy2 = 0.
00029       dfz2 = 0.
00030       fxs = 0.
00031       fys = 0.
00032       fzs = 0.
00033       do i=1,ntest
00034         dfx2 = dfx2 + (exd(i) - ex(i))**2
00035         dfy2 = dfy2 + (eyd(i) - ey(i))**2
00036         dfz2 = dfz2 + (ezd(i) - ez(i))**2
00037         dpot = dpot + (potd(i) - pot(i))/potd(i)
00038         fxs = fxs + exd(i)**2
00039         fys = fys + eyd(i)**2
00040         fzs = fzs + ezd(i)**2
00041       end do
00042 
00043       write (*,*) '  i   pot_t    pot_d    ex_t    ex_d'
00044       write (*,'((i5,4(1pe14.4)))') (i,pot(i),potd(i),ex(i),exd(i),i=1,ntest)
00045 
00046       errfx = sqrt(dfx2/fxs)
00047       errfy = sqrt(dfy2/fys)
00048       errfz = sqrt(dfz2/fzs)
00049       write (6,101) errfx,errfy,errfz,(errfx+errfy+errfz)/3.
00050  101  format (/'Force errors - x,y,z,ave: ',4(1pe15.5))
00051   
00052       end subroutine error_test
00053
